1. Ada duplikasi kode dalam kondisi loading:
```kotlin
when {
 isLoading -> {
 if (viewMode == ViewMode.GRID) {
 VehicleLoadingGrid()
 } else {
 VehicleLoadingGrid()
 }
 }
 // ...
}
```
Di sini, `VehicleLoadingGrid()` dipanggil untuk kedua kondisi view mode, yang tidak efisien dan mungkin merupakan kesalahan. Seharusnya ada `VehicleLoadingList()` untuk mode list.

2. Ada TODO yang belum diimplementasikan:
 - `// TODO: Navigate to vehicle detail`
 - `// TODO: Navigate to rent vehicle`

3. Struktur penutupan kurung kurawal mungkin membingungkan karena banyaknya nested layout.

4. Tidak ada penanganan error yang spesifik untuk berbagai jenis error yang mungkin terjadi.

Apakah ada masalah spesifik yang ingin Anda tanyakan tentang file ini?

<augment_code_snippet path="app/src/main/java/com/example/rentalinn/screens/user/rental/UserRentalScreen.kt" mode="EDIT">
```kotlin
package com.example.rentalinn.screens.user.rental

import androidx.compose.foundation.layout.*
import androidx.compose.foundation.lazy.LazyColumn
import androidx.compose.foundation.lazy.grid.GridCells
import androidx.compose.foundation.lazy.grid.LazyVerticalGrid
import androidx.compose.foundation.lazy.grid.items
import androidx.compose.foundation.lazy.items
import androidx.compose.material.icons.Icons
import androidx.compose.material.icons.filled.*
import androidx.compose.material3.*
import androidx.compose.material3.pullrefresh.PullRefreshIndicator
import androidx.compose.material3.pullrefresh.pullRefresh
import androidx.compose.material3.pullrefresh.rememberPullRefreshState
import androidx.compose.runtime.*
import androidx.compose.ui.Alignment
import androidx.compose.ui.Modifier
import androidx.compose.ui.platform.LocalContext
import androidx.compose.ui.text.font.FontWeight
import androidx.compose.ui.unit.dp
import androidx.lifecycle.viewmodel.compose.viewModel
import androidx.navigation.NavController
import com.example.rentalinn.ui.components.*
import com.example.rentalinn.viewmodel.VehicleViewModel

enum class ViewMode {
 LIST, GRID
}

@OptIn(ExperimentalMaterial3Api::class)
@Composable
fun UserRentalScreen(
 navController: NavController,
 modifier: Modifier = Modifier
) {
 val context = LocalContext.current
 val vehicleViewModel: VehicleViewModel = viewModel(
 factory = VehicleViewModel.Factory(context)
 )

 val vehicles by vehicleViewModel.vehicles.collectAsState()
 val isLoading by vehicleViewModel.isLoading.collectAsState()
 val isRefreshing by vehicleViewModel.isRefreshing.collectAsState()
 val error by vehicleViewModel.error.collectAsState()
 val errorType by vehicleViewModel.errorType.collectAsState()
 val isNetworkAvailable by vehicleViewModel.isNetworkAvailable.collectAsState()
 val categories by vehicleViewModel.categories.collectAsState()
 val searchQuery by vehicleViewModel.searchQuery.collectAsState()
 val currentFilter by vehicleViewModel.currentFilter.collectAsState()
 val currentSort by vehicleViewModel.currentSort.collectAsState()

 var showFilterDialog by remember { mutableStateOf(false) }
 var viewMode by remember { mutableStateOf(ViewMode.LIST) }

 val pullRefreshState = rememberPullRefreshState(
 refreshing = isRefreshing,
 onRefresh = { vehicleViewModel.refreshVehicles() }
 )

 Column(modifier = modifier.fillMaxSize()) {
 // Network status indicator
 OfflineIndicator(isOffline = !isNetworkAvailable)

 Box(
 modifier = Modifier
 .fillMaxSize()
 .pullRefresh(pullRefreshState)
 ) {
 Column(
 modifier = Modifier.fillMaxSize()
 ) {
 // Rest of your UI code...
 }
 
 PullRefreshIndicator(
 refreshing = isRefreshing,
 state = pullRefreshState,
 modifier = Modifier.align(Alignment.TopCenter)
 )
 }
 }
 
 // Filter Dialog
 if (showFilterDialog) {
 VehicleFilterDialog(
 filter = currentFilter,
 onFilterChange = { vehicleViewModel.updateFilter(it) },
 onDismiss = { showFilterDialog = false },
 onApply = { showFilterDialog = false },
 onReset = {
 vehicleViewModel.resetFilter()
 showFilterDialog = false
 },
 categories = categories
 )
 }
}
```

n/MainActivity.kt"}},{"char_start":"961","char_end":"1713","blob_name":"e4471ff6a00c3d78cdb5443af570119e5aace5e5aad5de60b9969676f6f38bdc","file":{"repoRoot":"","pathName":"app/src/main/java/com/example/rentalinn/navigation/AppNavGraph.kt"}},{"char_start":"1713","char_end":"2706","blob_name":"e4471ff6a00c3d78cdb5443af570119e5aace5e5aad5de60b9969676f6f38bdc","file":{"repoRoot":"","pathName":"app/src/main/java/com/example/rentalinn/navigation/AppNavGraph.kt"}},{"char_start":"0","char_end":"384","blob_name":"1d08278f592a689efed5ad466d297437735442fdf76dc6f6d5621ae071ea2274","file":{"repoRoot":"","pathName":"settings.gradle.kts"}},{"char_start":"928","char_end":"1867","blob_name":"db3a137e499e48bb97ba622bd7b4486c10cfc48470b818477b7e77fe27d53fc9","file":{"repoRoot":"","pathName":"app/src/main/java/com/example/rentalinn/ui/theme/Theme.kt"}},{"char_start":"2501","char_end":"3748","blob_name":"92175bd2c8799c5b2ffe6d1e0d4aab5c1c591dece85a2b6368c726a232e5e35a","file":{"repoRoot":"","pathName":"app/src/main/java/com/example/rentalinn/ui/components/CompactVehicleCard.kt"}},{"char_start":"736","char_end":"1486","blob_name":"2a147f0be6b8fa2b987a5af23fa7e0498560781cfce370d3abe3325b52007044","file":{"repoRoot":"","pathName":"gradle.properties"}},{"char_start":"4144","char_end":"5524","blob_name":"1a563d5aca1df215ea6b4bbdcee45e8c0958403a48eba7357da17f29680aba78","file":{"repoRoot":"","pathName":"app/src/main/java/com/example/rentalinn/ui/components/VehicleCard.kt"}},{"char_start":"4835","char_end":"5485","blob_name":"c34ee5df6ebb56d2387b7768477cc5c47e9b0cda0642a7c764fa6889b8dd333b","file":{"repoRoot":"","pathName":"app/src/main/java/com/example/rentalinn/screens/admin/rental/RentalScreen.kt"}},{"char_start":"4042","char_end":"5314","blob_name":"679e43c49973462f0304c84555b94fbc784f213747fb8fe26ad5afac1ec3ecd7","file":{"repoRoot":"","pathName":"app/src/main/java/com/example/rentalinn/screens/login/LoginScreen.kt"}},{"char_start":"0","char_end":"296","blob_name":"80a28015ec959dc07d51b563 Kalau sekarang?"}]}]},"mentioned_items":[],"structured_output_nodes":[{"id":0,"type":0,"content":"Saya melihat masalah baru dengan penggunaan `Modifier.align()`. Masalah ini terjadi karena `align()` hanya dapat digunakan dalam konteks layout tertentu seperti `Box`. Mari kita perbaiki kodenya:

<augment_code_snippet path="app/src/main/java/com/example/rentalinn/screens/user/rental/UserRentalScreen.kt" mode="EDIT">
```kotlin
@OptIn(ExperimentalMaterial3Api::class)
@Composable
fun UserRentalScreen(
 navController: NavController,
 modifier: Modifier = Modifier
) {
 val context = LocalContext.current
 val vehicleViewModel: VehicleViewModel = viewModel(
 factory = VehicleViewModel.Factory(context)
 )

 val vehicles by vehicleViewModel.vehicles.collectAsState()
 val isLoading by vehicleViewModel.isLoading.collectAsState()
 val isRefreshing by vehicleViewModel.isRefreshing.collectAsState()
 val error by vehicleViewModel.error.collectAsState()
 val errorType by vehicleViewModel.errorType.collectAsState()
 val isNetworkAvailable by vehicleViewModel.isNetworkAvailable.collectAsState()
 val categories by vehicleViewModel.categories.collectAsState()
 val searchQuery by vehicleViewModel.searchQuery.collectAsState()
 val currentFilter by vehicleViewModel.currentFilter.collectAsState()
 val currentSort by vehicleViewModel.currentSort.collectAsState()

 var showFilterDialog by remember { mutableStateOf(false) }
 var viewMode by remember { mutableStateOf(ViewMode.LIST) }

 val pullRefreshState = rememberPullRefreshState(
 refreshing = isRefreshing,
 onRefresh = { vehicleViewModel.refreshVehicles() }
 )

 Column(modifier = modifier.fillMaxSize()) {
 // Network status indicator
 OfflineIndicator(isOffline = !isNetworkAvailable)

 Box(
 modifier = Modifier
 .fillMaxSize()
 .pullRefresh(pullRefreshState)
 ) {
 Column(
 modifier = Modifier.fillMaxSize()
 ) {
 // Search Bar
 VehicleSearchBar(
 query = searchQuery,
 onQueryChange = { vehicleViewModel.updateSearchQuery(it) },
 onSearch = { vehicleViewModel.updateSearchQuery(it) },
 onFilterClick = { showFilterDialog = true },
 modifier = Modifier.padding(16.dp)
 )

 // Category Filter and Controls
 Row(
 modifier = Modifier
 .fillMaxWidth()
 .padding(horizontal = 16.dp),
 horizontalArrangement = Arrangement.SpaceBetween,
 verticalAlignment = Alignment.CenterVertically
 ) {
 // Row content...
 }

 // Category Filter
 if (categories.isNotEmpty()) {
 VehicleCategoryFilter(
 categories = categories,
 selectedCategory = currentFilter.category,
 onCategorySelected = { category ->
 vehicleViewModel.updateFilter(
 currentFilter.copy(category = category)
 )
 },
 modifier = Modifier.padding(vertical = 8.dp)
 )
 }

 // Vehicle Content
 when {
 isLoading -> {
 Box(modifier = Modifier.fillMaxSize()) {
 CircularProgressIndicator(
 modifier = Modifier.align(Alignment.Center)
 )
 }
 }
 error != null && errorType != null -> {
 ErrorMessage(
 errorType = errorType!!,
 onRetry = { vehicleViewModel.retryLastOperation() }
 )
 }
 vehicles.isEmpty() -> {
 VehicleEmptyState(
 title = "No vehicles found",
 message = if (searchQuery.isNotEmpty() || currentFilter.category != null) {
 "Try adjusting your search or filters"
 } else {
 "Check back later for new vehicles"
 },
 onAction = if (searchQuery.isNotEmpty() || currentFilter.category != null) {
 {
 vehicleViewModel.clearSearch()
 vehicleViewModel.resetFilter()
 }
 } else null,
 actionText = "Clear Filters"
 )
 }
 else -> {
 if (viewMode == ViewMode.GRID) {
 LazyVerticalGrid(
 columns = GridCells.Fixed(2),
 modifier = Modifier.fillMaxSize(),
 contentPadding = PaddingValues(16.dp),
 horizontalArrangement = Arrangement.spacedBy(12.dp),
 verticalArrangement = Arrangement.spacedBy(16.dp)
 ) {
 items(vehicles) { vehicle ->
 CompactVehicleCard(
 vehicle = vehicle,
 onCardClick = {
 // TODO: Navigate to vehicle detail
 },
 onRentClick = {
 // TODO: Navigate to rent vehicle
 }
 )
 }
 }
 } else {
 LazyColumn(
 modifier = Modifier.fillMaxSize(),
 contentPadding = PaddingValues(16.dp),
 verticalArrangement = Arrangement.spacedBy(16.dp)
 ) {
 items(vehicles) { vehicle ->
 VehicleCard(
 vehicle = vehicle,
 onCardClick = {
 // TODO: Navigate to vehicle detail
 },
 onRentClick = {
 // TODO: Navigate to rent vehicle
 }
 )
 }
 }
 }
 }
 }
 }
 
 PullRefreshIndicator(
 refreshing = isRefreshing,
 state = pullRefreshState,
 modifier = Modifier.align(Alignment.TopCenter)
 )
 }
 }
 
 // Filter Dialog
 if (showFilterDialog) {
 VehicleFilterDialog(
 filter = currentFilter,
 onFilterChange = { vehicleViewModel.updateFilter(it) },
 onDismiss = { showFilterDialog = false },
 onApply = { showFilterDialog = false },
 onReset = {
 vehicleViewModel.resetFilter()
 showFilterDialog = false
 },
 categories = categories
 )
 }
}
```
</augment_code_snippet>

Perubahan utama:

1. Saya memastikan `Modifier.align()` hanya digunakan dalam konteks `Box`
2. Saya mengganti `VehicleLoadingGrid()` dengan `CircularProgressIndicator` dalam `Box` untuk menampilkan loading indicator
3. Saya mempertahankan struktur dengan `Box` sebagai parent untuk `Column` konten utama dan `PullRefreshIndicator`

Dengan perubahan ini, error "cannot be called in this context with an implicit receiver" seharusnya teratasi.

````kotlin path=app/src/main/java/com/example/rentalinn/screens/user/rental/UserRentalScreen.kt mode=EDIT
@OptIn(ExperimentalMaterial3Api::class)
@Composable
fun UserRentalScreen(
 navController: NavController,
 modifier: Modifier = Modifier
) {
 val context = LocalContext.current
 val vehicleViewModel: VehicleViewModel = viewModel(
 factory = VehicleViewModel.Factory(context)
 )

 val vehicles by vehicleViewModel.vehicles.collectAsState()
 val isLoading by vehicleViewModel.isLoading.collectAsState()
 val isRefreshing by vehicleViewModel.isRefreshing.collectAsState()
 val error by vehicleViewModel.error.collectAsState()
 val errorType by vehicleViewModel.errorType.collectAsState()
 val isNetworkAvailable by vehicleViewModel.isNetworkAvailable.collectAsState()
 val categories by vehicleViewModel.categories.collectAsState()
 val searchQuery by vehicleViewModel.searchQuery.collectAsState()
 val currentFilter by vehicleViewModel.currentFilter.collectAsState()
 val currentSort by vehicleViewModel.currentSort.collectAsState()

 var showFilterDialog by remember { mutableStateOf(false) }
 var viewMode by remember { mutableStateOf(ViewMode.LIST) }

 val pullRefreshState = rememberPullRefreshState(
 refreshing = isRefreshing,
 onRefresh = { vehicleViewModel.refreshVehicles() }
 )

 Column(modifier = modifier.fillMaxSize()) {
 // Network status indicator
 OfflineIndicator(isOffline = !isNetworkAvailable)

 Box(
 modifier = Modifier
 .fillMaxSize()
 .pullRefresh(pullRefreshState)
 ) {
 Column(
 modifier = Modifier.fillMaxSize()
 ) {
 // Search Bar
 VehicleSearchBar(
 query = searchQuery,
 onQueryChange = { vehicleViewModel.updateSearchQuery(it) },
 onSearch = { vehicleViewModel.updateSearchQuery(it) },
 onFilterClick = { showFilterDialog = true },
 modifier = Modifier.padding(16.dp)
 )

 // Category Filter and Controls
 Row(
 modifier = Modifier
 .fillMaxWidth()
 .padding(horizontal = 16.dp),
 horizontalArrangement = Arrangement.SpaceBetween,
 verticalAlignment = Alignment.CenterVertically
 ) {
 // Row content...
 }

 // Category Filter
 if (categories.isNotEmpty()) {
 VehicleCategoryFilter(
 categories = categories,
 selectedCategory = currentFilter.category,
 onCategorySelected = { category ->
 vehicleViewModel.updateFilter(
 currentFilter.copy(category = category)
 )
 },
 modifier = Modifier.padding(vertical = 8.dp)
 )
 }

 // Vehicle Content
 when {
 isLoading -> {
 Box(modifier = Modifier.fillMaxSize()) {
 CircularProgressIndicator(
 modifier = Modifier.align(Alignment.Center)
 )
 }
 }
 error != null && errorType != null -> {
 ErrorMessage(
 errorType = errorType!!,
 onRetry = { vehicleViewModel.retryLastOperation() }
 )
 }
 vehicles.isEmpty() -> {
 VehicleEmptyState(
 title = "No vehicles found",
 message = if (searchQuery.isNotEmpty() || currentFilter.category != null) {
 "Try adjusting your search or filters"
 } else {
 "Check back later for new vehicles"
 },
 onAction = if (searchQuery.isNotEmpty() || currentFilter.category != null) {
 {
 vehicleViewModel.clearSearch()
 vehicleViewModel.resetFilter()
 }
 } else null,
 actionText = "Clear Filters"
 )
 }
 else -> {
 if (viewMode == ViewMode.GRID) {
 LazyVerticalGrid(
 columns = GridCells.Fixed(2),
 modifier = Modifier.fillMaxSize(),
 contentPadding = PaddingValues(16.dp),
 horizontalArrangement = Arrangement.spacedBy(12.dp),
 verticalArrangement = Arrangement.spacedBy(16.dp)
 ) {
 items(vehicles) { vehicle ->
 CompactVehicleCard(
 vehicle = vehicle,
 onCardClick = {
 // TODO: Navigate to vehicle detail
 },
 onRentClick = {
 // TODO: Navigate to rent vehicle
 }
 )
 }
 }
 } else {
 LazyColumn(
 modifier = Modifier.fillMaxSize(),
 contentPadding = PaddingValues(16.dp),
 verticalArrangement = Arrangement.spacedBy(16.dp)
 ) {
 items(vehicles) { vehicle ->
 VehicleCard(
 vehicle = vehicle,
 onCardClick = {
 // TODO: Navigate to vehicle detail
 },
 onRentClick = {
 // TODO: Navigate to rent vehicle
 }
 )
 }
 }
 }
 }
 }
 }
 
 PullRefreshIndicator(
 refreshing = isRefreshing,
 state = pullRefreshState,
 modifier = Modifier.align(Alignment.TopCenter)
 )
 }
 }
 
 // Filter Dialog
 if (showFilterDialog) {
 VehicleFilterDialog(
 filter = currentFilter,
 onFilterChange = { vehicleViewModel.updateFilter(it) },
 onDismiss = { showFilterDialog = false },
 onApply = { showFilterDialog = false },
 onReset = {
 vehicleViewModel.resetFilter()
 showFilterDialog = false
 },
 categories = categories
 )
 }
}
````

Perubahan utama:

1. Saya memastikan `Modifier.align()` hanya digunakan dalam konteks `Box`
2. Saya mengganti `VehicleLoadingGrid()` dengan `CircularProgressIndicator` dalam `Box` untuk menampilkan loading indicator
3. Saya mempertahankan struktur dengan `Box` sebagai parent untuk `Column` konten utama dan `PullRefreshIndicator`

Dengan perubahan ini, error "cannot be called in this context with an implicit receiver" seharusnya teratasi.

```kotlin
 {
```

```kotlin
package com.example.rentalinn.screens.user.home

import androidx.compose.foundation.background
import androidx.compose.foundation.layout.*
import androidx.compose.foundation.lazy.LazyColumn
import androidx.compose.foundation.lazy.LazyRow
import androidx.compose.foundation.lazy.items
import androidx.compose.foundation.shape.CircleShape
import androidx.compose.foundation.shape.RoundedCornerShape
import androidx.compose.material.icons.Icons
import androidx.compose.material.icons.filled.*
import androidx.compose.material3.*
import androidx.compose.runtime.*
import androidx.compose.ui.Alignment
import androidx.compose.ui.Modifier
import androidx.compose.ui.draw.clip
import androidx.compose.ui.graphics.Brush
import androidx.compose.ui.graphics.Color
import androidx.compose.ui.graphics.vector.ImageVector
import androidx.compose.ui.platform.LocalContext
import androidx.compose.ui.text.font.FontWeight
import androidx.compose.ui.unit.dp
import androidx.lifecycle.viewmodel.compose.viewModel
import androidx.navigation.NavController
import com.example.rentalinn.ui.components.*
import com.example.rentalinn.viewmodel.VehicleViewModel
import androidx.compose.material3.pulltorefresh.PullToRefreshContainer
import androidx.compose.material3.pulltorefresh.rememberPullToRefreshState
import androidx.compose.ui.input.nestedscroll.nestedScroll

@OptIn(ExperimentalMaterial3Api::class)
@Composable
fun UserHomeScreen(
 navController: NavController,
 modifier: Modifier = Modifier
) {
 val context = LocalContext.current
 val vehicleViewModel: VehicleViewModel = viewModel(
 factory = VehicleViewModel.Factory(context)
 )

 val vehicles by vehicleViewModel.vehicles.collectAsState()
 val isLoading by vehicleViewModel.isLoading.collectAsState()
 val isRefreshing by vehicleViewModel.isRefreshing.collectAsState()
 val error by vehicleViewModel.error.collectAsState()
 val errorType by vehicleViewModel.errorType.collectAsState()
 val isNetworkAvailable by vehicleViewModel.isNetworkAvailable.collectAsState()
 val categories by vehicleViewModel.categories.collectAsState()

 val pullToRefreshState = rememberPullToRefreshState()

 // Handle pull to refresh
 LaunchedEffect(isRefreshing) {
 if (isRefreshing) {
 pullToRefreshState.startRefresh()
 } else {
 pullToRefreshState.endRefresh()
 }
 }

 // Trigger refresh when user pulls
 LaunchedEffect(pullToRefreshState.isRefreshing) {
 if (pullToRefreshState.isRefreshing) {
 vehicleViewModel.refreshVehicles()
 }
 }

 Box(
 modifier = modifier
 .fillMaxSize()
 .nestedScroll(pullToRefreshState.nestedScrollConnection)
 ) {
 Column(modifier = Modifier.fillMaxSize()) {
 // Network status indicator
 OfflineIndicator(isOffline = !isNetworkAvailable)

 LazyColumn(
 modifier = Modifier
 .fillMaxSize()
 .background(MaterialTheme.colorScheme.background)
 .padding(horizontal = 20.dp),
 verticalArrangement = Arrangement.spacedBy(24.dp)
 ) {
 // Content...
 }
 }
 
 PullToRefreshContainer(
 state = pullToRefreshState,
 modifier = Modifier.align(Alignment.TopCenter)
 )
 }
}
```

````kotlin path=app/src/main/java/com/example/rentalinn/screens/user/rental/UserRentalScreen.kt mode=EDIT
@OptIn(ExperimentalMaterial3Api::class)
@Composable
fun UserRentalScreen(
 navController: NavController,
 modifier: Modifier = Modifier
) {
 val context = LocalContext.current
 val vehicleViewModel: VehicleViewModel = viewModel(
 factory = VehicleViewModel.Factory(context)
 )

 val vehicles by vehicleViewModel.vehicles.collectAsState()
 val isLoading by vehicleViewModel.isLoading.collectAsState()
 val isRefreshing by vehicleViewModel.isRefreshing.collectAsState()
 val error by vehicleViewModel.error.collectAsState()
 val errorType by vehicleViewModel.errorType.collectAsState()
 val isNetworkAvailable by vehicleViewModel.isNetworkAvailable.collectAsState()
 val categories by vehicleViewModel.categories.collectAsState()
 val searchQuery by vehicleViewModel.searchQuery.collectAsState()
 val currentFilter by vehicleViewModel.currentFilter.collectAsState()
 val currentSort by vehicleViewModel.currentSort.collectAsState()

 var showFilterDialog by remember { mutableStateOf(false) }
 var viewMode by remember { mutableStateOf(ViewMode.LIST) }

 val pullRefreshState = rememberPullRefreshState(
 refreshing = isRefreshing,
 onRefresh = { vehicleViewModel.refreshVehicles() }
 )

 Column(modifier = modifier.fillMaxSize()) {
 // Network status indicator
 OfflineIndicator(isOffline = !isNetworkAvailable)

 Box(
 modifier = Modifier
 .fillMaxSize()
 .pullRefresh(pullRefreshState)
 ) {
 Column(
 modifier = Modifier.fillMaxSize()
 ) {
 // Search Bar
 VehicleSearchBar(
 query = searchQuery,
 onQueryChange = { vehicleViewModel.updateSearchQuery(it) },
 onSearch = { vehicleViewModel.updateSearchQuery(it) },
 onFilterClick = { showFilterDialog = true },
 modifier = Modifier.padding(16.dp)
 )

 // Category Filter and Controls
 Row(
 modifier = Modifier
 .fillMaxWidth()
 .padding(horizontal = 16.dp),
 horizontalArrangement = Arrangement.SpaceBetween,
 verticalAlignment = Alignment.CenterVertically
 ) {
 Row(
 horizontalArrangement = Arrangement.spacedBy(8.dp),
 verticalAlignment = Alignment.CenterVertically
 ) {
 VehicleSortChip(
 currentSort = currentSort,
 onSortChange = { vehicleViewModel.updateSort(it) }
 )

 Text(
 text = "${vehicles.size} vehicles",
 style = MaterialTheme.typography.bodyMedium,
 color = MaterialTheme.colorScheme.onSurfaceVariant
 )
 }

 Row(
 horizontalArrangement = Arrangement.spacedBy(8.dp)
 ) {
 IconButton(
 onClick = { viewMode = ViewMode.LIST }
 ) {
 Icon(
 Icons.Default.ViewList,
 contentDescription = "List view",
 tint = if (viewMode == ViewMode.LIST)
 MaterialTheme.colorScheme.primary
 else
 MaterialTheme.colorScheme.onSurfaceVariant
 )
 }

 IconButton(
 onClick = { viewMode = ViewMode.GRID }
 ) {
 Icon(
 Icons.Default.GridView,
 contentDescription = "Grid view",
 tint = if (viewMode == ViewMode.GRID)
 MaterialTheme.colorScheme.primary
 else
 MaterialTheme.colorScheme.onSurfaceVariant
 )
 }
 }
 }

 // Vehicle Content
 when {
 isLoading -> {
 Box(modifier = Modifier.fillMaxSize()) {
 CircularProgressIndicator(
 modifier = Modifier.align(Alignment.Center)
 )
 }
 }
 error != null && errorType != null -> {
 ErrorMessage(
 errorType = errorType!!,
 onRetry = { vehicleViewModel.retryLastOperation() }
 )
 }
 vehicles.isEmpty() -> {
 VehicleEmptyState(
 title = "No vehicles found",
 message = if (searchQuery.isNotEmpty() || currentFilter.category != null) {
 "Try adjusting your search or filters"
 } else {
 "Check back later for new vehicles"
 },
 onAction = if (searchQuery.isNotEmpty() || currentFilter.category != null) {
 {
 vehicleViewModel.clearSearch()
 vehicleViewModel.resetFilter()
 }
 } else null,
 actionText = "Clear Filters"
 )
 }
 else -> {
 if (viewMode == ViewMode.GRID) {
 LazyVerticalGrid(
 columns = GridCells.Fixed(2),
 modifier = Modifier.fillMaxSize(),
 contentPadding = PaddingValues(16.dp),
 horizontalArrangement = Arrangement.spacedBy(12.dp),
 verticalArrangement = Arrangement.spacedBy(16.dp)
 ) {
 items(vehicles) { vehicle ->
 CompactVehicleCard(
 vehicle = vehicle,
 onCardClick = {
 // TODO: Navigate to vehicle detail
 },
 onRentClick = {
 // TODO: Navigate to rent vehicle
 }
 )
 }
 }
 } else {
 LazyColumn(
 modifier = Modifier.fillMaxSize(),
 contentPadding = PaddingValues(16.dp),
 verticalArrangement = Arrangement.spacedBy(16.dp)
 ) {
 items(vehicles) { vehicle ->
 VehicleCard(
 vehicle = vehicle,
 onCardClick = {
 // TODO: Navigate to vehicle detail
 },
 onRentClick = {
 // TODO: Navigate to rent vehicle
 }
 )
 }
 }
 }
 }
 }
 }
 
 PullRefreshIndicator(
 refreshing = isRefreshing,
 state = pullRefreshState,
 modifier = Modifier.align(Alignment.TopCenter)
 )
 }
 
 // Filter Dialog
 if (showFilterDialog) {
 VehicleFilterDialog(
 filter = currentFilter,
 onFilterChange = { vehicleViewModel.updateFilter(it) },
 onDismiss = { showFilterDialog = false },
 onApply = { showFilterDialog = false },
 onReset = {
 vehicleViewModel.resetFilter()
 showFilterDialog = false
 },
 categories = categories
 )
 }
 } // Closing brace for outer Column
}
````

error tuh","rich_text_json_repr":{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Masih error tuh"}]}]},"mentioned_items":[],"structured_output_nodes":[{"id":0,"type":0,"content":"Saya melihat masalah yang masih terjadi. Ada dua masalah utama:

1. Di `UserDashboardScreen.kt`: Parameter `navController` tidak diberikan ke `UserRentalScreen()`
2. Di `UserRentalScreen.kt`: Referensi ke komponen pull-to-refresh masih belum terselesaikan

Mari kita perbaiki keduanya:

1. Pertama, perbaiki `UserDashboardScreen.kt`:

<augment_code_snippet path="app/src/main/java/com/example/rentalinn/screens/user/UserDashboardScreen.kt" mode="EDIT">
```kotlin
composable(UserScreen.Rental.route) {
 UserRentalScreen(navController = userNavController)
}
```
</augment_code_snippet>

2. Sekarang, perbaiki `UserRentalScreen.kt` dengan menambahkan dependensi yang benar:

<augment_code_snippet path="app/src/main/java/com/example/rentalinn/screens/user/rental/UserRentalScreen.kt" mode="EDIT">
```kotlin
package com.example.rentalinn.screens.user.rental

import androidx.compose.foundation.layout.*
import androidx.compose.foundation.lazy.LazyColumn
import androidx.compose.foundation.lazy.grid.GridCells
import androidx.compose.foundation.lazy.grid.LazyVerticalGrid
import androidx.compose.foundation.lazy.grid.items
import androidx.compose.foundation.lazy.items
import androidx.compose.material.icons.Icons
import androidx.compose.material.icons.automirrored.filled.ViewList
import androidx.compose.material.icons.filled.*
import androidx.compose.material3.*
import androidx.compose.runtime.*
import androidx.compose.ui.Alignment
import androidx.compose.ui.Modifier
import androidx.compose.ui.platform.LocalContext
import androidx.compose.ui.text.font.FontWeight
import androidx.compose.ui.unit.dp
import androidx.lifecycle.viewmodel.compose.viewModel
import androidx.navigation.NavController
import com.example.rentalinn.ui.components.*
import com.example.rentalinn.viewmodel.VehicleViewModel
import com.google.accompanist.swiperefresh.SwipeRefresh
import com.google.accompanist.swiperefresh.rememberSwipeRefreshState

enum class ViewMode {
 LIST, GRID
}

@Composable
fun UserRentalScreen(
 navController: NavController,
 modifier: Modifier = Modifier
) {
 val context = LocalContext.current
 val vehicleViewModel: VehicleViewModel = viewModel(
 factory = VehicleViewModel.Factory(context)
 )

 val vehicles by vehicleViewModel.vehicles.collectAsState()
 val isLoading by vehicleViewModel.isLoading.collectAsState()
 val isRefreshing by vehicleViewModel.isRefreshing.collectAsState()
 val error by vehicleViewModel.error.collectAsState()
 val errorType by vehicleViewModel.errorType.collectAsState()
 val isNetworkAvailable by vehicleViewModel.isNetworkAvailable.collectAsState()
 val categories by vehicleViewModel.categories.collectAsState()
 val searchQuery by vehicleViewModel.searchQuery.collectAsState()
 val currentFilter by vehicleViewModel.currentFilter.collectAsState()
 val currentSort by vehicleViewModel.currentSort.collectAsState()

 var showFilterDialog by remember { mutableStateOf(false) }
 var viewMode by remember { mutableStateOf(ViewMode.LIST) }

 val swipeRefreshState = rememberSwipeRefreshState(isRefreshing)

 Column(modifier = modifier.fillMaxSize()) {
 // Network status indicator
 OfflineIndicator(isOffline = !isNetworkAvailable)

 SwipeRefresh(
 state = swipeRefreshState,
 onRefresh = { vehicleViewModel.refreshVehicles() }
 ) {
 Column(
 modifier = Modifier.fillMaxSize()
 ) {
 // Search Bar
 VehicleSearchBar(
 query = searchQuery,
 onQueryChange = { vehicleViewModel.updateSearchQuery(it) },
 onSearch = { vehicleViewModel.updateSearchQuery(it) },
 onFilterClick = { showFilterDialog = true },
 modifier = Modifier.padding(16.dp)
 )

 // Category Filter and Controls
 Row(
 modifier = Modifier
 .fillMaxWidth()
 .padding(horizontal = 16.dp),
 horizontalArrangement = Arrangement.SpaceBetween,
 verticalAlignment = Alignment.CenterVertically
 ) {
 Row(
 horizontalArrangement = Arrangement.spacedBy(8.dp),
 verticalAlignment = Alignment.CenterVertically
 ) {
 VehicleSortChip(
 currentSort = currentSort,
 onSortChange = { vehicleViewModel.updateSort(it) }
 )

 Text(
 text = "${vehicles.size} vehicles",

 )

 )

 // Vehicle Content
 when {

 CircularProgressIndicator(

 )
 }

 ErrorMessage(

 onRetry = { vehicleViewModel.retryLastOperation() }
 )
 }
 vehicles.isEmpty() -> {

 "Try adjusting your search or filters"
 } else {

 },

 {
 vehicleViewModel.clearSearch()

 }
 } else null,

 )
 }
 else -> {
 if (viewMode == ViewMode.GRID) {
 LazyVerticalGrid(
 columns = GridCells.Fixed(2),

 CompactVehicleCard(

 ) {

 },

 }

 }
```

````kotlin path=app/src/main/java/com/example/rentalinn/screens/user/rental/UserRentalScreen.kt mode=EDIT
package com.example.rentalinn.screens.user.rental

import androidx.compose.foundation.layout.*
import androidx.compose.foundation.lazy.LazyColumn
import androidx.compose.foundation.lazy.grid.GridCells
import androidx.compose.foundation.lazy.grid.LazyVerticalGrid
import androidx.compose.foundation.lazy.grid.items
import androidx.compose.foundation.lazy.items
import androidx.compose.material.icons.Icons
import androidx.compose.material.icons.automirrored.filled.ViewList
import androidx.compose.material.icons.filled.*
import androidx.compose.material3.*
import androidx.compose.runtime.*
import androidx.compose.ui.Alignment
import androidx.compose.ui.Modifier
import androidx.compose.ui.platform.LocalContext
import androidx.compose.ui.text.font.FontWeight
import androidx.compose.ui.unit.dp
import androidx.lifecycle.viewmodel.compose.viewModel
import androidx.navigation.NavController
import com.example.rentalinn.ui.components.*
import com.example.rentalinn.viewmodel.VehicleViewModel
import com.google.accompanist.swiperefresh.SwipeRefresh
import com.google.accompanist.swiperefresh.rememberSwipeRefreshState

enum class ViewMode {
 LIST, GRID
}

@Composable
fun UserRentalScreen(
 navController: NavController,
 modifier: Modifier = Modifier
) {
 val context = LocalContext.current
 val vehicleViewModel: VehicleViewModel = viewModel(
 factory = VehicleViewModel.Factory(context)
 )

 val vehicles by vehicleViewModel.vehicles.collectAsState()
 val isLoading by vehicleViewModel.isLoading.collectAsState()
 val isRefreshing by vehicleViewModel.isRefreshing.collectAsState()
 val error by vehicleViewModel.error.collectAsState()
 val errorType by vehicleViewModel.errorType.collectAsState()
 val isNetworkAvailable by vehicleViewModel.isNetworkAvailable.collectAsState()
 val categories by vehicleViewModel.categories.collectAsState()
 val searchQuery by vehicleViewModel.searchQuery.collectAsState()
 val currentFilter by vehicleViewModel.currentFilter.collectAsState()
 val currentSort by vehicleViewModel.currentSort.collectAsState()

 var showFilterDialog by remember { mutableStateOf(false) }
 var viewMode by remember { mutableStateOf(ViewMode.LIST) }

 val swipeRefreshState = rememberSwipeRefreshState(isRefreshing)

 Column(modifier = modifier.fillMaxSize()) {
 // Network status indicator
 OfflineIndicator(isOffline = !isNetworkAvailable)

 SwipeRefresh(
 state = swipeRefreshState,
 onRefresh = { vehicleViewModel.refreshVehicles() }
 ) {
 Column(
 modifier = Modifier.fillMaxSize()
 ) {
 // Search Bar
 VehicleSearchBar(
 query = searchQuery,
 onQueryChange = { vehicleViewModel.updateSearchQuery(it) },
 onSearch = { vehicleViewModel.updateSearchQuery(it) },
 onFilterClick = { showFilterDialog = true },
 modifier = Modifier.padding(16.dp)
 )

 // Category Filter and Controls
 Row(
 modifier = Modifier
 .fillMaxWidth()
 .padding(horizontal = 16.dp),
 horizontalArrangement = Arrangement.SpaceBetween,
 verticalAlignment = Alignment.CenterVertically
 ) {
 Row(
 horizontalArrangement = Arrangement.spacedBy(8.dp),
 verticalAlignment = Alignment.CenterVertically
 ) {
 VehicleSortChip(
 currentSort = currentSort,
 onSortChange = { vehicleViewModel.updateSort(it) }
 )

 Text(
 text = "${vehicles.size} vehicles",
 style = MaterialTheme.typography.bodyMedium,
 color = MaterialTheme.colorScheme.onSurfaceVariant
 )
 }

 Row(
 horizontalArrangement = Arrangement.spacedBy(8.dp)
 ) {
 IconButton(
 onClick = { viewMode = ViewMode.LIST }
 ) {
 Icon(
 Icons.AutoMirrored.Filled.ViewList,
 contentDescription = "List view",
 tint = if (viewMode == ViewMode.LIST)
 MaterialTheme.colorScheme.primary
 else
 MaterialTheme.colorScheme.onSurfaceVariant
 )
 }

 IconButton(
 onClick = { viewMode = ViewMode.GRID }
 ) {
 Icon(
 Icons.Default.GridView,
 contentDescription = "Grid view",
 tint = if (viewMode == ViewMode.GRID)
 MaterialTheme.colorScheme.primary
 else
 MaterialTheme.colorScheme.onSurfaceVariant
 )
 }
 }
 }

 // Vehicle Content
 when {
 isLoading -> {
 Box(modifier = Modifier.fillMaxSize()) {
 CircularProgressIndicator(
 modifier = Modifier.align(Alignment.Center)
 )
 }
 }
 error != null && errorType != null -> {
 ErrorMessage(
 errorType = errorType!!,
 onRetry = { vehicleViewModel.retryLastOperation() }
 )
 }
 vehicles.isEmpty() -> {
 VehicleEmptyState(
 title = "No vehicles found",
 message = if (searchQuery.isNotEmpty() || currentFilter.category != null) {
 "Try adjusting your search or filters"
 } else {
 "Check back later for new vehicles"
 },
 onAction = if (searchQuery.isNotEmpty() || currentFilter.category != null) {
 {
 vehicleViewModel.clearSearch()
 vehicleViewModel.resetFilter()
 }
 } else null,
 actionText = "Clear Filters"
 )
 }
 else -> {
 if (viewMode == ViewMode.GRID) {
 LazyVerticalGrid(
 columns = GridCells.Fixed(2),
 modifier = Modifier.fillMaxSize(),
 contentPadding = PaddingValues(16.dp),
 horizontalArrangement = Arrangement.spacedBy(12.dp),
 verticalArrangement = Arrangement.spacedBy(16.dp)
 ) {
 items(vehicles) { vehicle ->
 CompactVehicleCard(
 vehicle = vehicle,
 onCardClick = {
 // TODO: Navigate to vehicle detail
 },
 onRentClick = {
 // TODO: Navigate to rent vehicle
 }
 )
 }
 }
 } else {
 LazyColumn(
 modifier = Modifier.fillMaxSize(),
 contentPadding = PaddingValues(16.dp),
 verticalArrangement = Arrangement.spacedBy(16.dp)
 ) {
 items(vehicles) { vehicle ->
 VehicleCard(
 vehicle = vehicle,
 onCardClick = {
 // TODO: Navigate to vehicle detail
 },
 onRentClick = {
 // TODO: Navigate to rent vehicle
 }
 )
 }
 }
 }
 }
 }
 }
 }
 
 // Filter Dialog
 if (showFilterDialog) {
 VehicleFilterDialog(
 filter = currentFilter,
 onFilterChange = { vehicleViewModel.updateFilter(it) },
 onDismiss = { showFilterDialog = false },
 onApply = { showFilterDialog = false },
 onReset = {
 vehicleViewModel.resetFilter()
 showFilterDialog = false
 },
 categories = categories
 )
 }
 }
}
````

tart":"1866","char_end":"2778","blob_name":"3ec6cbd11fdbadf78dc9406bd39844542775579fef8a063be34a29502e1f3dfe","file":{"repoRoot":"","pathName":"app/src/main/java/com/example/rentalinn/screens/admin/vehicle/EditVehicleScreen.kt"}},{"char_start":"2778","char_end":"4011","blob_name":"3ec6cbd11fdbadf78dc9406bd39844542775579fef8a063be34a29502e1f3dfe","file":{"repoRoot":"","pathName":"app/src/main/java/com/example/rentalinn/screens/admin/vehicle/EditVehicleScreen.kt"}},{"char_start":"757","char_end":"1553","blob_name":"d57431a2e4c01442f83c1df4d5b632b1a50b34a1d75d85a87156f8473d697d80","file":{"repoRoot":"","pathName":"app/src/main/java/com/example/rentalinn/MainActivity.kt"}},{"char_start":"5317","char_end":"5766","blob_name":"06a3303778d06bc56b7ec96a7cf7fbb2930eb25b1b3714c768b0d01a49caadb2","file":{"repoRoot":"","pathName":"gradlew"}}]},{"status":"success","request_id":"2a6aef3a-3b85-41bd-acb3-dd365cf0d9ca","request_message":"Kalau error itu kenapa?? soalnya force close","rich_text_json_repr":{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Kalau error itu kenapa?? soalnya force close"}]}]},"mentioned_items":[],"structured_output_nodes":[{"id":0,"type":0,"content":"Berdasarkan log error yang Anda berikan, masalah utamanya adalah:

```
java.lang.SecurityException: ConnectivityService: Neither user 10516 nor current process has android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE.
```

Aplikasi Anda mencoba mengakses status jaringan melalui `NetworkStateManager` tetapi tidak memiliki izin `ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE` yang diperlukan. Ini adalah izin yang harus dideklarasikan di `AndroidManifest.xml`.

Mari kita perbaiki:

<augment_code_snippet path="app/src/main/AndroidManifest.xml" mode="EDIT">
```xml
<manifest xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
 xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools">

 <!-- Tambahkan izin internet dan network state -->
 <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.INTERNET" />
 <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE" />
 
 <application
 android:allowBackup="true"
 android:dataExtractionRules="@xml/data_extraction_rules"
 android:fullBackupContent="@xml/backup_rules"
 android:icon="@mipmap/ic_launcher"
 android:label="@string/app_name"
 android:roundIcon="@mipmap/ic_launcher_round"
 android:supportsRtl="true"
 android:theme="@style/Theme.RentalInn"
 android:usesCleartextTraffic="true"
 tools:targetApi="31">
 <!-- Aktivitas dan komponen lainnya -->
 </application>
</manifest>
```
</augment_code_snippet>

Masalah ini terjadi karena:

1. `NetworkStateManager` di aplikasi Anda menggunakan `ConnectivityManager` untuk memantau status jaringan
2. Untuk mengakses `ConnectivityManager`, aplikasi memerlukan izin `ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE`
3. Izin ini tidak dideklarasikan di `AndroidManifest.xml`

Dengan menambahkan izin `ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE` ke manifest, aplikasi Anda akan memiliki akses yang diperlukan untuk memeriksa status jaringan, dan error force close ini seharusnya teratasi.

Jika Anda masih mengalami masalah setelah menambahkan izin ini, beri tahu saya dan kita akan memeriksa masalah lain yang mungkin ada.

app/src/main/java/com/example/rentalinn/ui/theme/Theme.kt:928-1867"}],"seen_state":"seen","structured_request_nodes":[{"id":0,"type":0,"text_node":{"content":"Kalau error itu kenapa?? soalnya force close"}},{"id":1,"type":4,"ide_state_node":{"workspaceFolders":[{"repositoryRoot":"D:/ADIT WEB MOBILE ADIT/rentalinkedua/frontend","folderRoot":"D:/ADIT WEB MOBILE ADIT/rentalinkedua/frontend"}],"workspaceFoldersUnchanged":false}}],"timestamp":"2025-06-30T15:01:27.696Z","response_text":"Berdasarkan log error yang Anda berikan, masalah utamanya adalah:

```
java.lang.SecurityException: ConnectivityService: Neither user 10516 nor current process has android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE.
```

Aplikasi Anda mencoba mengakses status jaringan melalui `NetworkStateManager` tetapi tidak memiliki izin `ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE` yang diperlukan. Ini adalah izin yang harus dideklarasikan di `AndroidManifest.xml`.

Mari kita perbaiki:

````xml path=app/src/main/AndroidManifest.xml mode=EDIT
<manifest xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
 xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools">

 <!-- Tambahkan izin internet dan network state -->
 <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.INTERNET" />
 <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE" />
 
 <application
 android:allowBackup="true"
 android:dataExtractionRules="@xml/data_extraction_rules"
 android:fullBackupContent="@xml/backup_rules"
 android:icon="@mipmap/ic_launcher"
 android:label="@string/app_name"
 android:roundIcon="@mipmap/ic_launcher_round"
 android:supportsRtl="true"
 android:theme="@style/Theme.RentalInn"
 android:usesCleartextTraffic="true"
 tools:targetApi="31">
 <!-- Aktivitas dan komponen lainnya -->
 </application>
</manifest>
````

Masalah ini terjadi karena:

1. `NetworkStateManager` di aplikasi Anda menggunakan `ConnectivityManager` untuk memantau status jaringan
2. Untuk mengakses `ConnectivityManager`, aplikasi memerlukan izin `ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE`
3. Izin ini tidak dideklarasikan di `AndroidManifest.xml`

Dengan menambahkan izin `ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE` ke manifest, aplikasi Anda akan memiliki akses yang diperlukan untuk memeriksa status jaringan, dan error force close ini seharusnya teratasi.

Jika Anda masih mengalami masalah setelah menambahkan izin ini, beri tahu saya dan kita akan memeriksa masalah lain yang mungkin ada.

 21	sealed class Screen(val route: String) {
 22	 object Splash : Screen("splash")
 23	 object Onboarding : Screen("onboarding")
 24	 object Login : Screen("login")
 25	 object Register : Screen("register")
 26	 object AdminDashboard : Screen("admin_dashboard")
 27	 object UserDashboard : Screen("user_dashboard")
 28	 object VehicleLanding : Screen("vehicle_landing")
 29	 object AddVehicle : Screen("add_vehicle")
 30	 object EditVehicle : Screen("edit_vehicle/{vehicleId}")
 31	 object VehicleDetail : Screen("vehicle_detail/{vehicleId}")

 33	 fun createRoute(vararg args: String): String {
 34	 return buildString {
 35	 append(route)
 36	 args.forEach { arg ->
 37	 route.replace("{$arg}", arg)
 38	 }
 39	 }
 40	 }
 41	}

 24	
 25	fun getErrorType(throwable: Throwable?): ErrorType {
 26	 return when {
 27	 throwable?.message?.contains("Unable to resolve host") == true ||
 28	 throwable?.message?.contains("timeout") == true ||
 29	 throwable?.message?.contains("No address associated with hostname") == true -> ErrorType.Network
 30	 
 31	 throwable?.message?.contains("HTTP 404") == true ||
 32	 throwable?.message?.contains("not found") == true -> ErrorType.NotFound
 33	 
 34	 throwable?.message?.contains("HTTP 401") == true ||
 35	 throwable?.message?.contains("Unauthorized") == true -> ErrorType.Unauthorized
 36	 
 37	 throwable?.message?.contains("HTTP 5") == true ||
 38	 throwable?.message?.contains("Internal Server Error") == true -> ErrorType.Server
 39	 
 40	 else -> ErrorType.Unknown
 41	 }
 42	}
 43

 65	 "Retry"
 66	 )
 67	 }
 68	 ErrorType.NotFound -> {
 69	 Quadruple(
 70	 Icons.Default.SearchOff,
 71	 "Not Found",
 72	 "The requested resource could not be found.",
 73	 "Go Back"
 74	 )
 75	 }

 102	
 103	 fun loadVehicles(forceRefresh: Boolean = false) {
 104	 if (_allVehicles.value.isEmpty() || forceRefresh) {
 105	 _isLoading.value = true
 106	 _error.value = null
 107	 _errorType.value = null
 108	
 109	 viewModelScope.launch {
 110	 try {
 111	 repository.getAllVehicles()
 112	 .catch { e ->
 113	 handleError(e)
 114	 }
 115	 .collect { vehicleList ->
 116	 _allVehicles.value = vehicleList
 117	 updateCategories(vehicleList)
 118	 _isLoading.value = false
 119	 _retryCount.value = 0 // Reset retry count on success
 120	 }
 121	 } catch (e: Exception) {
 122	 handleError(e)
 123	 }
 124	 }
 125	 }
 126	 }
...
 146	
 147	 fun refreshVehicles() {
 148	 _isRefreshing.value = true
 149	 _error.value = null
 150	 _errorType.value = null
 151	 _retryCount.value = 0 // Reset retry count for manual refresh
 152	
 153	 viewModelScope.launch {
 154	 try {
 155	 repository.getAllVehicles()
 156	 .catch { e ->
 157	 handleError(e)
 158	 }
 159	 .collect { vehicleList ->
 160	 _allVehicles.value = vehicleList
 161	 updateCategories(vehicleList)
 162	 _isRefreshing.value = false
 163	 }
 164	 } catch (e: Exception) {
 165	 handleError(e)
 166	 }
 167	 }
 168	 }
 169	
 170	 fun getVehicleById(id: Int) {
 171	 _isLoading.value = true
 172	 viewModelScope.launch {
 173	 repository.getVehicleById(id)
 174	 .catch { e ->
 175	 _error.value = e.message
 176	 _isLoading.value = false
 177	 }
 178	 .collect { vehicle ->
 179	 _vehicle.value = vehicle
 180	 _isLoading.value = false
 181	 }
 182	 }
 183	 }

 15	
 16	sealed class AuthUiState {
 17	 object Idle : AuthUiState()
 18	 object Loading : AuthUiState()
 19	 data class Success(
 20	 val token: String?,
 21	 val user: User?,
 22	 val message: String?
 23	 ) : AuthUiState()
 24	 data class Error(val message: String) : AuthUiState()
 25	}
 26	
 27	class AuthViewModel(application: Application) : AndroidViewModel(application) {
 28	 private val repository: UserRepository
 29	 private val dataStore: DataStoreManager
 30	
 31	 init {
 32	 val context: Context = application.applicationContext
 33	 val apiService = RetrofitClient.getInstance(context).apiService
 34	 repository = UserRepository(apiService, context)
 35	 dataStore = DataStoreManager.getInstance(context)
 36	 }
 37	
 38	 private val _uiState = MutableStateFlow<AuthUiState>(AuthUiState.Idle)
 39	 val uiState: StateFlow<AuthUiState> = _uiState
 40	
 41	 fun login(email: String, password: String) {
 42	 viewModelScope.launch {
 43	 try {
 44	 _uiState.value = AuthUiState.Loading
 45	 val response = repository.login(email, password)

 25	fun getErrorType(throwable: Throwable?): ErrorType {
 26	 return when {
 27	 throwable?.message?.contains("Unable to resolve host") == true ||
 28	 throwable?.message?.contains("timeout") == true ||
 29	 throwable?.message?.contains("No address associated with hostname") == true -> ErrorType.Network
 30	 
 31	 throwable?.message?.contains("HTTP 404") == true ||
 32	 throwable?.message?.contains("not found") == true -> ErrorType.NotFound
 33	 
 34	 throwable?.message?.contains("HTTP 401") == true ||
 35	 throwable?.message?.contains("Unauthorized") == true -> ErrorType.Unauthorized
 36	 
 37	 throwable?.message?.contains("HTTP 5") == true ||
 38	 throwable?.message?.contains("Internal Server Error") == true -> ErrorType.Server
 39	 
 40	 else -> ErrorType.Unknown
 41	 }
 42	}

 103	 fun loadVehicles(forceRefresh: Boolean = false) {
 104	 if (_allVehicles.value.isEmpty() || forceRefresh) {
 105	 _isLoading.value = true
 106	 _error.value = null
 107	 _errorType.value = null
 108	
 109	 viewModelScope.launch {
 110	 try {
 111	 repository.getAllVehicles()
 112	 .catch { e ->
 113	 handleError(e)
 114	 }
 115	 .collect { vehicleList ->
 116	 _allVehicles.value = vehicleList
 117	 updateCategories(vehicleList)
 118	 _isLoading.value = false
 119	 _retryCount.value = 0 // Reset retry count on success
 120	 }
 121	 } catch (e: Exception) {
 122	 handleError(e)
 123	 }
 124	 }
 125	 }
 126	 }
 127	
 128	 private suspend fun handleError(throwable: Throwable) {
 129	 val errorType = getErrorType(throwable)
 130	 _errorType.value = errorType
 131	 _error.value = throwable.message ?: "Unknown error occurred"
 132	 _isLoading.value = false
 133	 _isRefreshing.value = false
 134	
 135	 // Implement exponential backoff for retries
 136	 if (errorType == ErrorType.Network && _retryCount.value < maxRetries) {
 137	 _retryCount.value += 1
 138	 val delayMs = (1000 * _retryCount.value * _retryCount.value).toLong() // Exponential backoff
 139	 delay(delayMs)
 140	
 141	 if (_isNetworkAvailable.value) {
 142	 loadVehicles(true)
 143	 }
 144	 }
 145	 }

 147	 fun refreshVehicles() {
 148	 _isRefreshing.value = true

 150	 _errorType.value = null
 151	 _retryCount.value = 0 // Reset retry count for manual refresh
 152	
 153	 viewModelScope.launch {
 154	 try {
 155	 repository.getAllVehicles()
 156	 .catch { e ->
 157	 handleError(e)
 158	 }
 159	 .collect { vehicleList ->
 160	 _allVehicles.value = vehicleList
 161	 updateCategories(vehicleList)
 162	 _isRefreshing.value = false
 163	 }
 164	 } catch (e: Exception) {
 165	 handleError(e)
 166	 }
 167	 }
 168	 }

 450	 val networkStateManager = NetworkStateManager.getInstance(context)

 452	 }
 453	 throw IllegalArgumentException("Unknown ViewModel class")
 454	 }

 1	package com.example.rentalinn.network
 2	
 3	import android.content.Context
 4	import com.example.rentalinn.utils.DataStoreManager
 5	import com.google.gson.GsonBuilder
 6	import kotlinx.coroutines.flow.first
 7	import kotlinx.coroutines.runBlocking
 8	import okhttp3.Interceptor
 9	import okhttp3.OkHttpClient
 10	import okhttp3.logging.HttpLoggingInterceptor
 11	import retrofit2.Retrofit
 12	import retrofit2.converter.gson.GsonConverterFactory
 13	import java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit
 14	
 15	class RetrofitClient private constructor(context: Context) {
 16	 private val dataStoreManager = DataStoreManager.getInstance(context)
 17	
 18	 private val authInterceptor = Interceptor { chain ->
 19	 val token = runBlocking {
 20	 dataStoreManager.token.first()
 21	 }
 22	 
 23	 val request = chain.request().newBuilder().apply {
 24	 if (token != null) {
 25	 addHeader("Authorization", "Bearer $token")
 26	 }
 27	 }.build()
 28	 
 29	 chain.proceed(request)
 30	 }
 31	
 32	 private val loggingInterceptor = HttpLoggingInterceptor().apply {
 33	 level = HttpLoggingInterceptor.Level.BODY
 34	 }
 35	
 36	 private val gson = GsonBuilder()
 37	 .setLenient()
 38	 .create()
 39	
 40	 private val client: OkHttpClient = OkHttpClient.Builder()
 41	 .addInterceptor(authInterceptor)
 42	 .addInterceptor(loggingInterceptor)
 43	 .connectTimeout(60, TimeUnit.SECONDS)
 44	 .readTimeout(60, TimeUnit.SECONDS)
 45	 .writeTimeout(60, TimeUnit.SECONDS)
 46	 .build()
 47	
 48	 private val retrofit: Retrofit = Retrofit.Builder()
 49	 .baseUrl(BASE_URL)
 50	 .client(client)
 51	 .addConverterFactory(GsonConverterFactory.create(gson))
 52	 .build()
 53	
 54	 val apiService: ApiService = retrofit.create(ApiService::class.java)
 55	
 56	 companion object {
 57	 private const val BASE_URL = "http://192.168.31.55:3000/api/"
 58	 
 59	 @Volatile
 60	 private var instance: RetrofitClient? = null
 61	
 62	 fun getInstance(context: Context): RetrofitClient {
 63	 return instance ?: synchronized(this) {
 64	 instance ?: RetrofitClient(context.applicationContext).also { instance = it }
 65	 }
 66	 }
 67	 }

 3	import android.content.Context
 4	import android.net.ConnectivityManager
 5	import android.net.Network
 6	import android.net.NetworkCapabilities
 7	import android.net.NetworkRequest
 8	import kotlinx.coroutines.channels.awaitClose
 9	import kotlinx.coroutines.flow.Flow
 10	import kotlinx.coroutines.flow.callbackFlow
 11	import kotlinx.coroutines.flow.distinctUntilChanged
 12	
 13	class NetworkStateManager(private val context: Context) {
 14	 
 15	 private val connectivityManager = context.getSystemService(Context.CONNECTIVITY_SERVICE) as ConnectivityManager
 16	 
 17	 val isNetworkAvailable: Flow<Boolean> = callbackFlow {
 18	 val networkCallback = object : ConnectivityManager.NetworkCallback() {
 19	 override fun onAvailable(network: Network) {
 20	 trySend(true)
 21	 }
 22	 
 23	 override fun onLost(network: Network) {
 24	 trySend(false)
 25	 }
 26	 
 27	 override fun onCapabilitiesChanged(
 28	 network: Network,
 29	 networkCapabilities: NetworkCapabilities
 30	 ) {
 31	 val hasInternet = networkCapabilities.hasCapability(NetworkCapabilities.NET_CAPABILITY_INTERNET)
 32	 val hasValidated = networkCapabilities.hasCapability(NetworkCapabilities.NET_CAPABILITY_VALIDATED)
 33	 trySend(hasInternet && hasValidated)
 34	 }
 35	 }
 36	 
 37	 val networkRequest = NetworkRequest.Builder()
 38	 .addCapability(NetworkCapabilities.NET_CAPABILITY_INTERNET)
 39	 .build()
 40	 
 41	 connectivityManager.registerNetworkCallback(networkRequest, networkCallback)
 42	 
 43	 // Send initial state
 44	 trySend(isCurrentlyConnected())
 45	 
 46	 awaitClose {
 47	 connectivityManager.unregisterNetworkCallback(networkCallback)
 48	 }
 49	 }.distinctUntilChanged()
 50	 
 51	 private fun isCurrentlyConnected(): Boolean {
 52	 val activeNetwork = connectivityManager.activeNetwork ?: return false
 53	 val capabilities = connectivityManager.getNetworkCapabilities(activeNetwork) ?: return false
 54	 return capabilities.hasCapability(NetworkCapabilities.NET_CAPABILITY_INTERNET) &&
 55	 capabilities.hasCapability(NetworkCapabilities.NET_CAPABILITY_VALIDATED)
 56	 }
 57	 
 58	 companion object {
 59	 @Volatile
 60	 private var instance: NetworkStateManager? = null
 61

 23	@Composable
 24	fun SplashScreen(
 25	 onNavigateToOnboarding: () -> Unit,
 26	 onNavigateToAdminDashboard: () -> Unit,
 27	 onNavigateToUserDashboard: () -> Unit,
 28	 onNavigateToLogin: () -> Unit
 29	) {
 30	 var startAnimation by remember { mutableStateOf(false) }
 31	 val alphaAnim = animateFloatAsState(
 32	 targetValue = if (startAnimation) 1f else 0f,
 33	 animationSpec = tween(durationMillis = 1000),
 34	 label = "Splash Alpha Animation"
 35	 )
 36	
 37	 val context = LocalContext.current
 38	 val dataStoreManager = remember { DataStoreManager.getInstance(context) }
 39	
 40	 LaunchedEffect(key1 = true) {
 41	 startAnimation = true
 42	 delay(2000)
 43	
 44	 // Check login state
 45	 val token = dataStoreManager.token.first()
 46	 val userRole = dataStoreManager.userRole.first()
 47	
 48	 when {
 49	 token == null -> {
 50	 val hasSeenOnboarding = dataStoreManager.hasSeenOnboarding.first()
 51	 if (hasSeenOnboarding) {
 52	 onNavigateToLogin()
 53	 } else {
 54	 onNavigateToOnboarding()
 55	 }
 56	 }
 57	 userRole == "admin" -> onNavigateToAdminDashboard()
 58	 userRole == "user" -> onNavigateToUserDashboard()
 59	 else -> onNavigateToLogin()
 60	 }
 61	 }

 21	sealed class Screen(val route: String) {
 22	 object Splash : Screen("splash")
 23	 object Onboarding : Screen("onboarding")
 24	 object Login : Screen("login")
 25	 object Register : Screen("register")
 26	 object AdminDashboard : Screen("admin_dashboard")
 27	 object UserDashboard : Screen("user_dashboard")
 28	 object VehicleLanding : Screen("vehicle_landing")
 29	 object AddVehicle : Screen("add_vehicle")
 30	 object EditVehicle : Screen("edit_vehicle/{vehicleId}")
 31	 object VehicleDetail : Screen("vehicle_detail/{vehicleId}")
 32	 
 33	 fun createRoute(vararg args: String): String {
 34	 return buildString {
 35	 append(route)
 36	 args.forEach { arg ->
 37	 route.replace("{$arg}", arg)
 38	 }
 39	 }
 40	 }
 41	}
 42	
 43	@Composable
 44	fun AppNavGraph(
 45	 navController: NavHostController,
 46	 startDestination: String = Screen.Splash.route
 47	) {
 48	 NavHost(
 49	 navController = navController,
 50	 startDestination = startDestination
 51	 ) {
 52	 composable(Screen.Splash.route) {
 53	 SplashScreen(
 54	 onNavigateToOnboarding = {
 55	 navController.navigate(Screen.Onboarding.route) {
 56	 popUpTo(Screen.Splash.route) { inclusive = true }
 57	 }
 58	 },
 59	 onNavigateToAdminDashboard = {
 60	 navController.navigate(Screen.AdminDashboard.route) {
 61	 popUpTo(Screen.Splash.route) { inclusive = true }
 62	 }
 63	 },
 64	 onNavigateToUserDashboard = {
 65	 navController.navigate(Screen.UserDashboard.route) {
 66	 popUpTo(Screen.Splash.route) { inclusive = true }
 67	 }
 68	 },
 69	 onNavigateToLogin = {
 70	 navController.navigate(Screen.Login.route) {
 71	 popUpTo(Screen.Splash.route) { inclusive = true }
 72	 }
 73	 }
 74	 )
 75	 }
 76	
 77	 composable(Screen.Onboarding.route) {
 78	 OnboardingScreen(
 79	 onNavigateToLogin = {
 80	 navController.navigate(Screen.Login.route) {
 81	 popUpTo(Screen.Onboarding.route) { inclusive = true }
 82	 }
 83	 }
 84	 )
 85	 }
 86	
 87	 composable(Screen.Login.route) {
 88	 LoginScreen(
 89	 navController = navController,
 90	 onNavigateToRegister = {
 91	 navController.navigate(Screen.Register.route)
 92	 }
 93	 )
 94	 }
 95	
 96	 composable(Screen.Register.route) {
 97	 RegisterScreen(
 98	 onNavigateBack = {
 99	 navController.popBackStack()
 100	 },
 101	 onRegisterSuccess = {
 102	 navController.navigate(Screen.Login.route) {
 103	 popUpTo(Screen.Register.route) { inclusive = true }
 104	 }
 105	 }
 106	 )
 107	 }
 108	
 109	 composable(Screen.AdminDashboard.route) {
 110	 AdminDashboardScreen(
 111	 onLogout = {
 112	 navController.navigate(Screen.Login.route) {
 113	 popUpTo(Screen.AdminDashboard.route) { inclusive = true }
 114	 }
 115	 }
 116	 )
 117	 }
 118	
 119	 composable(Screen.UserDashboard.route) {
 120	 UserDashboardScreen(
 121	 navController = navController
 122	 )
 123	 }
 124	 
 125	 // Vehicle routes
 126	 composable(Screen.VehicleLanding.route) {
 127	 VehicleLandingScreen(navController = navController)
 128	 }
 129	 
 130	 composable(Screen.AddVehicle.route) {
 131	 AddVehicleScreen(navController = navController)
 132	 }

 111	 // Handle UI state
 112	 LaunchedEffect(uiState) {
 113	 when (uiState) {
 114	 is AuthUiState.Success -> {
 115	 // Show success message
 116	 scope.launch {
 117	 snackbarHostState.showSnackbar(
 118	 message = (uiState as AuthUiState.Success).message ?: "Login successful!",
 119	 duration = SnackbarDuration.Short
 120	 )
 121	 }
 122	 
 123	 // Clear form
 124	 email = ""
 125	 password = ""
 126	 
 127	 // Navigate based on role
 128	 delay(1500)
 129	 val user = (uiState as AuthUiState.Success).user
 130	 when (user?.role) {
 131	 "admin" -> {
 132	 navController.navigate(Screen.AdminDashboard.route) {
 133	 popUpTo(Screen.Login.route) { inclusive = true }
 134	 }
 135	 }
 136	 "user" -> {
 137	 navController.navigate(Screen.UserDashboard.route) {
 138	 popUpTo(Screen.Login.route) { inclusive = true }
 139	 }
 140	 }
 141	 }
 142	 viewModel.resetState()
 143	 }

 45	@OptIn(ExperimentalMaterial3Api::class)
 46	@Composable
 47	fun UserDashboardScreen(
 48	 navController: NavController,
 49	 modifier: Modifier = Modifier
 50	) {
 51	 val userNavController = rememberNavController()
 52	 val currentRoute = userNavController.currentBackStackEntryAsState().value?.destination?.route
 53	 val viewModel: AuthViewModel = viewModel()
 54	 val uiState by viewModel.uiState.collectAsState()
 55	
 56	 LaunchedEffect(uiState) {
 57	 if (uiState is AuthUiState.Success && (uiState as AuthUiState.Success).token == null) {
 58	 navController.navigate("login") {
 59	 popUpTo(navController.graph.startDestinationId) {
 60	 inclusive = true
 61	 }
 62	 }
 63	 }
 64	 }

 1	package com.example.rentalinn.utils
 2	
 3	import android.content.Context
 4	import android.util.Log
 5	import androidx.datastore.core.DataStore
 6	import androidx.datastore.preferences.core.Preferences
 7	import androidx.datastore.preferences.core.booleanPreferencesKey
 8	import androidx.datastore.preferences.core.edit
 9	import androidx.datastore.preferences.core.stringPreferencesKey
 10	import androidx.datastore.preferences.preferencesDataStore
 11	import kotlinx.coroutines.flow.Flow
 12	import kotlinx.coroutines.flow.catch
 13	import kotlinx.coroutines.flow.map
 14	
 15	private const val PREFERENCES_NAME = "rentalinkedua_preferences"
 16	private val Context.dataStore: DataStore<Preferences> by preferencesDataStore(name = PREFERENCES_NAME)
 17	
 18	class DataStoreManager private constructor(private val context: Context) {
 19	 private val TAG = "DataStoreManager"
 20	
 21	 companion object {
 22	 private val HAS_SEEN_ONBOARDING = booleanPreferencesKey("has_seen_onboarding")
 23	 private val TOKEN_KEY = stringPreferencesKey("token")
 24	 private val USER_ROLE_KEY = stringPreferencesKey("user_role")
 25	
 26	 @Volatile
 27	 private var instance: DataStoreManager? = null
 28	
 29	 fun getInstance(context: Context): DataStoreManager {
 30	 return instance ?: synchronized(this) {
 31	 instance ?: DataStoreManager(context.applicationContext).also { instance = it }
 32	 }
 33	 }
 34	 }
 35	
 36	 val hasSeenOnboarding: Flow<Boolean> = context.dataStore.data
 37	 .catch { exception ->
 38	 Log.e(TAG, "Error reading preferences: ", exception)
 39	 }
 40	 .map { preferences ->
 41	 val hasSeenOnboarding = preferences[HAS_SEEN_ONBOARDING] ?: false
 42	 Log.d(TAG, "Reading hasSeenOnboarding: $hasSeenOnboarding")
 43	 hasSeenOnboarding
 44	 }
 45	
 46	 suspend fun setHasSeenOnboarding(hasSeen: Boolean) {
 47	 try {
 48	 context.dataStore.edit { preferences ->
 49	 preferences[HAS_SEEN_ONBOARDING] = hasSeen
 50	 Log.d(TAG, "Setting hasSeenOnboarding to: $hasSeen")
 51	 }
 52	 } catch (e: Exception) {
 53	 Log.e(TAG, "Error saving hasSeenOnboarding: ", e)
 54	 }
 55	 }
 56	
 57	 suspend fun saveToken(token: String) {
 58	 context.dataStore.edit { preferences ->
 59	 preferences[TOKEN_KEY] = token
 60	 }
 61	 }
 62	
 63	 suspend fun saveUserRole(role: String) {
 64	 context.dataStore.edit { preferences ->
 65	 preferences[USER_ROLE_KEY] = role
 66	 }
 67	 }
 68	
 69	 val token: Flow<String?> = context.dataStore.data.map { preferences ->
 70	 preferences[TOKEN_KEY]
 71	 }
 72	
 73	 val userRole: Flow<String?> = context.dataStore.data.map { preferences ->
 74	 preferences[USER_ROLE_KEY]
 75	 }
 76	
 77	 suspend fun clearData() {
 78	 try {
 79	 context.dataStore.edit { preferences ->
 80	 preferences.clear()
 81	 // Explicitly clear specific keys to ensure they are removed
 82	 preferences.remove(TOKEN_KEY)
 83	 preferences.remove(USER_ROLE_KEY)
 84	 preferences.remove(HAS_SEEN_ONBOARDING)
 85	 }
 86	 } catch (e: Exception) {
 87	 Log.e(TAG, "Error clearing data: ", e)
 88	 throw e
 89	 }
 90	 }
 91	} ...

 1	package com.example.rentalinn.viewmodel
 2	
 3	import android.app.Application
 4	import android.content.Context
 5	import androidx.lifecycle.AndroidViewModel
 6	import androidx.lifecycle.viewModelScope
 7	import com.example.rentalinn.model.AuthResponse
 8	import com.example.rentalinn.model.User
 9	import com.example.rentalinn.network.RetrofitClient
 10	import com.example.rentalinn.repository.UserRepository
 11	import com.example.rentalinn.utils.DataStoreManager
 12	import kotlinx.coroutines.flow.MutableStateFlow
 13	import kotlinx.coroutines.flow.StateFlow
 14	import kotlinx.coroutines.launch
 15	
 16	sealed class AuthUiState {
 17	 object Idle : AuthUiState()
 18	 object Loading : AuthUiState()
 19	 data class Success(
 20	 val token: String?,
 21	 val user: User?,
 22	 val message: String?
 23	 ) : AuthUiState()
 24	 data class Error(val message: String) : AuthUiState()
 25	}
 26	
 27	class AuthViewModel(application: Application) : AndroidViewModel(application) {
 28	 private val repository: UserRepository
 29	 private val dataStore: DataStoreManager
 30	
 31	 init {
 32	 val context: Context = application.applicationContext
 33	 val apiService = RetrofitClient.getInstance(context).apiService
 34	 repository = UserRepository(apiService, context)
 35	 dataStore = DataStoreManager.getInstance(context)
 36	 }
 37	
 38	 private val _uiState = MutableStateFlow<AuthUiState>(AuthUiState.Idle)
 39	 val uiState: StateFlow<AuthUiState> = _uiState
 40	
 41	 fun login(email: String, password: String) {
 42	 viewModelScope.launch {
 43	 try {
 44	 _uiState.value = AuthUiState.Loading
 45	 val response = repository.login(email, password)
 46	 if (response.success) {
 47	 // Store token and user data
 48	 response.token?.let { dataStore.saveToken(it) }
 49	 response.user?.role?.let { dataStore.saveUserRole(it) }
 50	 _uiState.value = AuthUiState.Success(
 51	 token = response.token,
 52	 user = response.user,
 53	 message = response.message
 54	 )
 55	 } else {
 56	 _uiState.value = AuthUiState.Error(response.message ?: "Invalid credentials")
 57	 }
 58	 } catch (e: Exception) {
 59	 _uiState.value = AuthUiState.Error(e.message ?: "Unknown error occurred")
 60	 }
 61	 }
 62	 }
 63	
 64	 fun register(name: String, email: String, password: String, phoneNumber: String = "") {
 65	 viewModelScope.launch {
 66	 try {
 67	 _uiState.value = AuthUiState.Loading
 68	 val response = repository.register(name, email, password, phoneNumber)
 69	 if (response.success) {
 70	 // Store token and user data
 71	 response.token?.let { dataStore.saveToken(it) }
 72	 response.user?.role?.let { dataStore.saveUserRole(it) }
 73	 _uiState.value = AuthUiState.Success(
 74	 token = response.token,
 75	 user = response.user,
 76	 message = response.message
 77	 )
 78	 } else {
 79	 _uiState.value = AuthUiState.Error(response.message ?: "Registration failed")
 80	 }
 81	 } catch (e: Exception) {
 82	 _uiState.value = AuthUiState.Error(e.message ?: "Unknown error occurred")
 83	 }
 84	 }
 85	 }
 86	
 87	 fun resetState() {
 88	 _uiState.value = AuthUiState.Idle
 89	 }

## Analysis of Potential Issues

1. **Conflicting Vehicle Model Classes**: There are multiple `Vehicle` data classes defined in different files, which could cause type confusion and crashes.

2. **Network Initialization Issues**: The VehicleViewModel automatically loads vehicles on initialization, which could fail if network/API is not available.

4. **Base URL Mismatch**: Different base URLs are used in different files (192.168.31.55 vs 192.168.18.73).

5. **Potential Memory Leaks**: ViewModels might not be properly scoped or disposed.

## Detailed Plan

1. **Fix Vehicle Model Conflicts**: Remove duplicate Vehicle classes and ensure consistent usage
2. **Add Proper Error Handling**: Implement try-catch blocks and null safety checks
3. **Fix Network Configuration**: Ensure consistent base URLs and proper network error handling
4. **Add Lifecycle Management**: Implement proper ViewModel lifecycle management
5. **Add Crash Prevention**: Add defensive programming practices

 3	import com.google.gson.annotations.SerializedName
 4	import com.google.gson.annotations.JsonAdapter
 5	import com.google.gson.TypeAdapter
 6	import com.google.gson.stream.JsonReader
 7	import com.google.gson.stream.JsonWriter
 8	import com.google.gson.stream.JsonToken
 9	import org.json.JSONArray
 10	import java.io.IOException
 11	
 12	// Custom TypeAdapter for converting between string representation of JSON arrays and List<String>
 13	class StringArrayAdapter : TypeAdapter<List<String>>() {
 14	 @Throws(IOException::class)
 15	 override fun write(out: JsonWriter, value: List<String>?) {
 16	 if (value == null) {
 17	 out.nullValue()
 18	 return
 19	 }
 20	 val jsonArray = JSONArray()
 21	 value.forEach { jsonArray.put(it) }
 22	 out.value(jsonArray.toString())
 23	 }
 24	
 25	 @Throws(IOException::class)
 26	 override fun read(reader: JsonReader): List<String>? {
 27	 if (reader.peek() == JsonToken.NULL) {
 28	 reader.nextNull()
 29	 return null
 30	 }
 31	 
 32	 // Handle both string representation of arrays and actual JSON arrays
 33	 return when (reader.peek()) {
 34	 JsonToken.STRING -> {
 35	 // Handle string representation of array: "[\"/path/to/file.jpg\"]"
 36	 val jsonStr = reader.nextString()
 37	 try {
 38	 // Handle empty string or "null" string
 39	 if (jsonStr.isNullOrBlank() || jsonStr == "null") {
 40	 return emptyList()
 41	 }
 42	 
 43	 // Handle string that's not a JSON array but a single value
 44	 if (!jsonStr.startsWith("[") && !jsonStr.endsWith("]")) {
 45	 return listOf(jsonStr)
 46	 }
 47	 
 48	 val jsonArray = JSONArray(jsonStr)
 49	 val result = mutableListOf<String>()
 50	 for (i in 0 until jsonArray.length()) {
 51	 val item = jsonArray.getString(i)
 52	 if (item.isNotBlank() && item != "null") {
 53	 result.add(item)
 54	 }
 55	 }
 56	 result
 57	 } catch (e: Exception) {
 58	 // If parsing fails, return the original string as a single item list
 59	 // unless it's empty or "null"
 60	 if (jsonStr.isNotBlank() && jsonStr != "null") {
 61	 listOf(jsonStr)
 62	 } else {
 63	 emptyList()
 64	 }
 65	 }
 66	 }
 67	 JsonToken.BEGIN_ARRAY -> {
 68	 // Handle actual JSON array: ["/path/to/file.jpg"]
 69	 reader.beginArray()
 70	 val result = mutableListOf<String>()
 71	 while (reader.hasNext()) {
 72	 val item = reader.nextString()
 73	 if (item.isNotBlank() && item != "null") {
 74	 result.add(item)
 75	 }
 76	 }
 77	 reader.endArray()
 78	 result
 79	 }
 80	 else -> {
 81	 // Skip unknown tokens
 82	 reader.skipValue()
 83	 emptyList()
 84	 }
 85	 }
 86	 }
 87	}

 103	 fun loadVehicles(forceRefresh: Boolean = false) {
 104	 if (_allVehicles.value.isEmpty() || forceRefresh) {
 105	 _isLoading.value = true
 106	 _error.value = null
 107	 _errorType.value = null
 108	
 109	 viewModelScope.launch {
 110	 try {
 111	 repository.getAllVehicles()
 112	 .catch { e ->
 113	 handleError(e)
 114	 }
 115	 .collect { vehicleList ->
 116	 _allVehicles.value = vehicleList
 117	 updateCategories(vehicleList)
 118	 _isLoading.value = false
 119	 _retryCount.value = 0 // Reset retry count on success
 120	 }
 121	 } catch (e: Exception) {
 122	 handleError(e)
 123	 }
 124	 }
 125	 }
 126	 }

 149	 _error.value = null
 150	 _errorType.value = null
 151	 _retryCount.value = 0 // Reset retry count for manual refresh
 152	
 153	 viewModelScope.launch {
 154	 try {
 155	 repository.getAllVehicles()
 156	 .catch { e ->
 157	 handleError(e)
 158	 }
 159	 .collect { vehicleList ->
 160	 _allVehicles.value = vehicleList
 161	 updateCategories(vehicleList)
 162	 _isRefreshing.value = false

 174	 .catch { e ->

 176	 _isLoading.value = false
 177	 }

 179	 _vehicle.value = vehicle

 181	 }

Let me create a detailed plan to fix these issues:

## Analysis of Potential Issues

1. **Conflicting Vehicle Model Classes**: There are multiple `Vehicle` data classes defined in different files, which could cause type confusion and crashes.

2. **Network Initialization Issues**: The VehicleViewModel automatically loads vehicles on initialization, which could fail if network/API is not available.

3. **Missing Error Handling**: Some UI components might not handle null or empty data gracefully.

4. **Base URL Mismatch**: Different base URLs are used in different files (192.168.31.55 vs 192.168.18.73).

5. **Potential Memory Leaks**: ViewModels might not be properly scoped or disposed.

## Detailed Plan

1. **Fix Vehicle Model Conflicts**: Remove duplicate Vehicle classes and ensure consistent usage
2. **Add Proper Error Handling**: Implement try-catch blocks and null safety checks
3. **Fix Network Configuration**: Ensure consistent base URLs and proper network error handling
4. **Add Lifecycle Management**: Implement proper ViewModel lifecycle management
5. **Add Crash Prevention**: Add defensive programming practices

Let me start implementing these fixes:

 194	 // TODO: Navigate to vehicle detail

 103	 fun loadVehicles(forceRefresh: Boolean = false) {
 104	 if (_allVehicles.value.isEmpty() || forceRefresh) {
 105	 _isLoading.value = true
 106	 _error.value = null
 107	 _errorType.value = null
 108	
 109	 viewModelScope.launch {
 110	 try {
 111	 repository.getAllVehicles()
 112	 .catch { e ->
 113	 handleError(e)
 114	 }
 115	 .collect { vehicleList ->
 116	 _allVehicles.value = vehicleList
 117	 updateCategories(vehicleList)
 118	 _isLoading.value = false
 119	 _retryCount.value = 0 // Reset retry count on success
 120	 }
 121	 } catch (e: Exception) {
 122	 handleError(e)
 123	 }
 124	 }
 125	 }
 126	 }
 127	
 128	 private suspend fun handleError(throwable: Throwable) {
 129	 val errorType = getErrorType(throwable)
 130	 _errorType.value = errorType
 131	 _error.value = throwable.message ?: "Unknown error occurred"
 132	 _isLoading.value = false
 133	 _isRefreshing.value = false
 134	
 135	 // Implement exponential backoff for retries
 136	 if (errorType == ErrorType.Network && _retryCount.value < maxRetries) {
 137	 _retryCount.value += 1
 138	 val delayMs = (1000 * _retryCount.value * _retryCount.value).toLong() // Exponential backoff
 139	 delay(delayMs)
 140	
 141	 if (_isNetworkAvailable.value) {
 142	 loadVehicles(true)
 143	 }
 144	 }
 145	 }

 161	 updateCategories(vehicleList)
 162	 _isRefreshing.value = false
 163	 }

 166	 }
 167	 }

 367	 private fun updateCategories(vehicles: List<Vehicle>) {

 369	 _categories.value = categorySet.toList()
 370	 }

 378	 fun retryLastOperation() {
 379	 when {
 380	 _isLoading.value || _isRefreshing.value -> return // Already loading
 381	 _allVehicles.value.isEmpty() -> loadVehicles(true)
 382	 else -> refreshVehicles()
 383	 }

 386	 // Helper methods for filtering and sorting
 387	 private fun matchesSearch(vehicle: Vehicle, query: String): Boolean {
 388	 if (query.isBlank()) return true
 389	 val searchQuery = query.lowercase()
 390	 return vehicle.title.lowercase().contains(searchQuery) ||
 391	 vehicle.brand.lowercase().contains(searchQuery) ||
 392	 vehicle.model.lowercase().contains(searchQuery) ||
 393	 vehicle.vehicleCategory.lowercase().contains(searchQuery) ||
 394	 vehicle.description?.lowercase()?.contains(searchQuery) == true
 395	 }
 396	
 397	 private fun matchesFilter(vehicle: Vehicle, filter: VehicleFilter): Boolean {
 398	 // Category filter
 399	 if (filter.category != null && vehicle.vehicleCategory != filter.category) {
 400	 return false
 401	 }
 402	
 403	 // Price filter
 404	 if (filter.minPrice != null && vehicle.pricePerDay < filter.minPrice) {
 405	 return false
 406	 }
 407	 if (filter.maxPrice != null && vehicle.pricePerDay > filter.maxPrice) {
 408	 return false
 409	 }
 410	
 411	 // Transmission filter
 412	 if (filter.transmission != null && vehicle.transmission != filter.transmission) {
 413	 return false
 414	 }
 415	
 416	 // Fuel type filter
 417	 if (filter.fuelType != null && vehicle.fuelType != filter.fuelType) {
 418	 return false
 419	 }
 420	
 421	 // Passenger capacity filter
 422	 if (filter.minPassengers != null && vehicle.passengerCapacity < filter.minPassengers) {
 423	 return false
 424	 }
 425	
 426	 // Available only filter
 427	 if (filter.availableOnly && !vehicle.isAvailable()) {
 428	 return false
 429	 }
 430	
 431	 return true
 432	 }
 433	
 434	 private fun sortVehicles(vehicles: List<Vehicle>, sort: SortOption): List<Vehicle> {
 435	 return when (sort) {
 436	 SortOption.PRICE_LOW_TO_HIGH -> vehicles.sortedBy { it.pricePerDay }
 437	 SortOption.PRICE_HIGH_TO_LOW -> vehicles.sortedByDescending { it.pricePerDay }
 438	 SortOption.NEWEST_FIRST -> vehicles.sortedByDescending { it.year }
 439	 SortOption.OLDEST_FIRST -> vehicles.sortedBy { it.year }
 440	 SortOption.ALPHABETICAL -> vehicles.sortedBy { it.title }
 441	 }
 442	 }
 443	
 444	 class Factory(private val context: Context) : ViewModelProvider.Factory {
 445	 @Suppress("UNCHECKED_CAST")
 446	 override fun <T : ViewModel> create(modelClass: Class<T>): T {
 447	 if (modelClass.isAssignableFrom(VehicleViewModel::class.java)) {
 448	 val apiService = RetrofitClient.getInstance(context).apiService
 449	 val repository = VehicleRepository(apiService)
 450	 val networkStateManager = NetworkStateManager.getInstance(context)
 451	 return VehicleViewModel(repository, networkStateManager) as T
 452	 }
 453	 throw IllegalArgumentException("Unknown ViewModel class")
 454	 }
 455	 }

 434	 private fun sortVehicles(vehicles: List<Vehicle>, sort: SortOption): List<Vehicle> {
 435	 return when (sort) {
 436	 SortOption.PRICE_LOW_TO_HIGH -> vehicles.sortedBy { it.pricePerDay }
 437	 SortOption.PRICE_HIGH_TO_LOW -> vehicles.sortedByDescending { it.pricePerDay }
 438	 SortOption.NEWEST_FIRST -> vehicles.sortedByDescending { it.year }
 439	 SortOption.OLDEST_FIRST -> vehicles.sortedBy { it.year }
 440	 SortOption.ALPHABETICAL -> vehicles.sortedBy { it.title }
 441	 }
 442	 }

 1	package com.example.rentalinn.utils
 2	
 3	import android.content.Context
 4	import android.net.ConnectivityManager
 5	import android.net.Network
 6	import android.net.NetworkCapabilities
 7	import android.net.NetworkRequest
 8	import kotlinx.coroutines.channels.awaitClose
 9	import kotlinx.coroutines.flow.Flow
 10	import kotlinx.coroutines.flow.callbackFlow
 11	import kotlinx.coroutines.flow.distinctUntilChanged
 12	
 13	class NetworkStateManager(private val context: Context) {
 14	 
 15	 private val connectivityManager = context.getSystemService(Context.CONNECTIVITY_SERVICE) as ConnectivityManager
 16	 
 17	 val isNetworkAvailable: Flow<Boolean> = callbackFlow {
 18	 val networkCallback = object : ConnectivityManager.NetworkCallback() {
 19	 override fun onAvailable(network: Network) {
 20	 trySend(true)
 21	 }
 22	 
 23	 override fun onLost(network: Network) {
 24	 trySend(false)
 25	 }
 26	 
 27	 override fun onCapabilitiesChanged(
 28	 network: Network,
 29	 networkCapabilities: NetworkCapabilities
 30	 ) {
 31	 val hasInternet = networkCapabilities.hasCapability(NetworkCapabilities.NET_CAPABILITY_INTERNET)
 32	 val hasValidated = networkCapabilities.hasCapability(NetworkCapabilities.NET_CAPABILITY_VALIDATED)
 33	 trySend(hasInternet && hasValidated)
 34	 }
 35	 }
 36	 
 37	 val networkRequest = NetworkRequest.Builder()
 38	 .addCapability(NetworkCapabilities.NET_CAPABILITY_INTERNET)
 39	 .build()
 40	 
 41	 connectivityManager.registerNetworkCallback(networkRequest, networkCallback)
 42	 
 43	 // Send initial state
 44	 trySend(isCurrentlyConnected())
 45	 
 46	 awaitClose {
 47	 connectivityManager.unregisterNetworkCallback(networkCallback)
 48	 }
 49	 }.distinctUntilChanged()
 50	 
 51	 private fun isCurrentlyConnected(): Boolean {
 52	 val activeNetwork = connectivityManager.activeNetwork ?: return false
 53	 val capabilities = connectivityManager.getNetworkCapabilities(activeNetwork) ?: return false
 54	 return capabilities.hasCapability(NetworkCapabilities.NET_CAPABILITY_INTERNET) &&
 55	 capabilities.hasCapability(NetworkCapabilities.NET_CAPABILITY_VALIDATED)
 56	 }
 57	 
 58	 companion object {
 59	 @Volatile
 60	 private var instance: NetworkStateManager? = null
 61	 
 62	 fun getInstance(context: Context): NetworkStateManager {
 63	 return instance ?: synchronized(this) {
 64	 instance ?: NetworkStateManager(context.applicationContext).also { instance = it }
 65	 }
 66	 }
 67	 }
 68	}
 69	
Total lines in file: 69
